c.x: Brush burning shall be limited to wood products only.
No construction/demolition materials or household garbage may be burned.
No chemically or creosote treated wood may be burned.
Woody materials, which may be, contaminated with other construction materia
No recyclable materials as defined in this Ordinance shall be burned.
All brush burning must be done between the hours of 6:00 pm and 12:00 am lo
No brush burning shall be permitted on Sundays and Holidays.
Brush Burning
Open/Barrel burning shall be limited to the burning of small woody debris a
No recyclable materials as defined may be burned.
No demolition materials as defined may be burned.
Barrels must be covered while burning with a screen, which will hold down f
All barrel burning must be between the hours of 6:00 pm and 12:00 am local
No barrel burning shall be permitted on Sundays and Holidays.
